name: Dead By Dani
description:
Dead By Dani is a horror first-person shooter game full of weird monsters and an epic boss battle, the game was made in about a week.

Game Controls:

WASD - Move.

Space - Jump.

E - Interact.

Enter - Progress Dialogue.

Escape - Cancel Dialogue.

Left Mouse Button - Shoot.

R - Reload

Mouse Scroll Wheel - Swap Items
